染.definition: to dye; to catch (a disease); to acquire (bad habits etc); to contaminate; to add color washes to a painting

染上.definition: to catch (a disease); to get (a bad habit)

染指.definition: to dip a finger (idiom); fig. to get one's finger in the pie; to get a share of the action; abbr. for 染指於鼎|染指于鼎

染指垂涎.definition: lit. dirty finger, mouth watering (idiom); fig. greedy to seize sth

染指於鼎.definition: lit. dip one's finger in the tripod (idiom); fig. to get one's finger in the pie; to get a share of the action

染病.definition: to catch an illness; to get infected with a disease

染色體三倍體症.pinyin: rǎn sè tǐ sān bèi tǐ zhèng

染風習俗.definition: bad habits; to get into bad habits through long custom

染髮.definition: to dye one's hair; rinse; tint
